title: Ceramic Artist & Studio Owner
bio: Passionate ceramic artist specializing in functional pottery and sculptural work. I draw inspiration from Japanese pottery traditions while exploring contemporary forms. My work focuses on the intersection of utility and beauty.

title: Pottery Instructor & Glaze Specialist
bio: Teaching pottery for over 15 years with a focus on glaze chemistry and experimental techniques. I love helping students discover their unique voice through clay while pushing the boundaries of traditional pottery methods.

title: Contemporary Ceramic Sculptor
bio: Creating large-scale ceramic installations and sculptures that explore themes of nature, identity, and cultural heritage. My work has been exhibited in galleries across the Pacific Northwest and featured in Ceramics Monthly.
